participant_1.background:
I love to go paddle boarding with my friends because it's a fun and active way to spend time together
i m the oldest of three boys.
I like to play video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
i hate winter and the cold.

participant_2.background:
My painting is my passion, and a Corvette would be the icing on the cake.
i am a rapper.
i broke my nose in 5th grade.
i write children s books.
i am studying for my masters.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to write children's books and paint.
What is your favorite kind of art to paint?
I enjoy painting landscapes and flowers.
That sounds so peaceful. I love to go paddle boarding with my friends.
That sounds like a great way to spend time with friends!
It is! I also enjoy playing video games to de-stress after a long day of welding.
I've never been much of a gamer, but I can see how it could be a good way to relax.
What do you do for work?
I'm a rapper and I'm also studying for my Masters.
Wow, that's really cool! I've never met a rapper before.
It's not as glamorous as it seems.
I'm sure it's still a lot of fun! I'm the oldest of three boys, and I hate winter and the cold.
I broke my nose in fifth grade, so I'm not a fan of the cold either.
I guess we have that in common! What is your favorite season?
I love summer! The weather is warm, and I can spend more time outside.
I like summer too, but I wish it lasted longer.
Me too! We should hang out sometime.
